content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #86172 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?

Kicked this over here because it is a regression and regressions are usually prioritized. However, fact that this has been on stable for months without someone catching it until now suggests it isn't that big a deal. Certainly not P-critical. I don't know between P-high and P-medium.

how does the mcve code look like? to my untrained eye it looks not easy to read but kind of not so difficult to repro in real world situations.
For this reason I'd be inclined to a cautious P-high (as you @inquisitivecrystal suggest) and maybe let T-compiler re-prio based on their thoughts.
